content: crochet a warm soft pair of mittens in luxurious velvet yarn **this pattern is available for free on the blog what you ll need yarn 1 skein bernat velvet in burgundy plum hook us j 6 00mm and k 6 5mm notions yarn needle stitch marker tape measure/ruler gauge 12 sts and 16 row = 4″ in single_crochet finished size approximately 7″ hand circumference fits average woman s hand notes mittens are interchangeable meaning the left and right mitten are the same make 2
